actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that members of all commissions, councils, and similar bodies in the executive branch of the Government appointed from private life shall serve without any remuneration for their services other than travel, subsistence, and other necessary expenses.

summary.text: Requires members of all commissions, councils, and similar bodies in the Executive branch of the Government appointed from private life to serve without compensation for their services other than travel, subsistence, and other necessary expenses.

titles.title: A bill to provide that members of all commissions, councils, and similar bodies in the executive branch of the Government appointed from private life shall serve without any remuneration for their services other than travel, subsistence, and other necessary expenses.
